gd.gen-ai.disclaimer: AI assistants can make mistakes. Check before relying on these answers.
gd.gen-ai.welcome.option-1.title: Search for a dashboard or visualisation
gd.gen-ai.welcome.option-1.answer: Sure thing, what kind of dashboard or visualisation would you like to see?
gd.gen-ai.welcome.option-2.title: Create a new visualisation
gd.gen-ai.welcome.option-2.answer: Sure thing, what kind of visualisation would you like to create?
gd.gen-ai.welcome.option-3.title: Answer a business question
gd.gen-ai.welcome.option-3.answer: Sure thing, what business question would you like to answer?
gd.gen-ai.global-error.description: Try restarting the chatbot and starting over.
gd.gen-ai.save-dialog.label: Name
gd.gen-ai.save-dialog.title: Name your visualisation
gd.gen-ai.save-dialog.description: Give your new visualisation a new descriptive name, so it's easier to find it later on.
gd.gen-ai.save-dialog.description.explor: To open this visualisation, it needs to be saved first. You can provide a name below.
gd.gen-ai.global-no-llm.description: Configure a provider to enable the chatbot
gd.gen-ai.permission-error.description: You don’t have access to the chatbot. Contact your administrator to request access
gd.gen-ai.dialog.label: AI assistant dialogue
gd.gen-ai.input-label.mac: Ask your question. Use control+space or cmd+I for suggestions
gd.gen-ai.input-label.win: Ask your question. Use control+space or control+I for suggestions
gd.gen-ai.messages.label: Chat messages
gd.gen-ai.visualisation.menu.button.open: This will prompt you to save the visualisation before you can open it.
